name: Shaped
description:
Arcade Shooter Game
- New enemies per progress
- New bosses every 5 waves
- Pace rises along with the progress
- Easy to play
- No network connection required
- The higher your score is when you die, the more points you will get per enemy next time.Touch left or right to move and your character will shoot automatically. Die at a higher wave every time and your score multiplier will get you some bonus. Thus, making some progress becomes easier each time!
